question:
Write a letter of invitation to your parents. In the letter:
– Explain that you have completed your studies
– Give details of the event, including time, date and dress code
– Let them know how many tickets they have and who they are for?
text: I hope you are safe and sound. I am jubilant to write this letter to tell you a wonderful news. I have completed my Graduation with an outstanding percentage. And I will get my official degree next week.

My university is organizing a ceremony for their graduated students. Hence, I want you to attend this ceremony and celebrate my success with me. The ceremony will be held on 13th June 2020 in my university auditorium. The timings are 4:00 pm to 9:00 pm. And our guest of honor would be Home minister. Furthermore, they have set a formal dressing which is mandatory for everyone. Therefore, you should wear a gown with the hat. I am sending the dress along with the tickets both for you and dad and also send an extra one for sister.
I will be waiting for you eagerly. So, I am hoping you will be on time.
Take care of yourself and say greetings to dad.

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article, a, may be redundant when used with the uncountable noun news in your sentence. Consider removing it.
The word graduated doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
